name: Web3 Frontend Development
description: Building responsive and interactive decentralized application front-ends.

cards.title: Web3.js & Ethers.js
cards.description: Understanding how to interact with blockchain networks from the frontend.
cards.bulletpoints: Connecting to Ethereum, sending transactions, querying smart contracts
cards.summaryText: Wire up ethers.js or web3.js to connect wallets, read contract state, and push transactions from the browser.

cards.title: Wallet Integration
cards.description: Connecting users' crypto wallets to dApps for authentication and transactions.
cards.summaryText: Implement wallet connect flows with MetaMask, WalletConnect, or Coinbase SDK so users can auth and sign safely.

cards.title: UI/UX Considerations for dApps
cards.description: Best practices for designing user-friendly and secure decentralized applications.
cards.bulletpoints: Gas fee estimation, transaction confirmations, multi-chain support
cards.summaryText: Design UX that surfaces gas costs, confirms transactions, and guides users across chains without confusion.
